text: 9:7 Ua Me Ini 30:10; Ofa Gami 16:2-34; Hibru 5:3; 7:27Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim uabɨra Bar Anogoroghezir Danganimɨn aven zui. Azeniba vaghvagha, a dughiar vamɨran aven zui. Egha a purama aven zuir puvatɨ. An asɨzibar ghuziba inigha aven zui. Egha ghuzir kamɨn a uan arazir kuraba gɨn amangasa ofa gamua, egha gumazamizir deragha nɨghnɨzir puvatɨzibar arazir kuraba, da gɨn amangasa ofabagh ami.
